Structs/HMAC.html#/s:6Crypto4HMACV8final.abstract: Returns the Message Authentication Code (MAC) from the data inputted into the MAC.

Structs/HKDF.html#/s:6Crypto4HKDFV9deriv.abstract: Derives a symmetric key using the HKDF algorithm.

Structs/SymmetricKey.html.name: SymmetricKey

Enums/CryptoKitASN1Error.html#/s:6Crypto.name: invalidFieldIdentifier
Enums/CryptoKitASN1Error.html#/s:6Crypto.abstract: The ASN.1 tag for this field is invalid or unsupported.

Enums/CryptoKitASN1Error.html#/s:6Crypto.name: unexpectedFieldType
Enums/CryptoKitASN1Error.html#/s:6Crypto.abstract: The ASN.1 tag for the parsed field does not match the required format.

Enums/CryptoKitASN1Error.html#/s:6Crypto.name: invalidObjectIdentifier
Enums/CryptoKitASN1Error.html#/s:6Crypto.abstract: An invalid ASN.1 object identifier was encountered.

Enums/CryptoKitASN1Error.html#/s:6Crypto.name: invalidASN1Object
Enums/CryptoKitASN1Error.html#/s:6Crypto.abstract: The format of the parsed ASN.1 object does not match the format required for the data type

Enums/CryptoKitASN1Error.html#/s:6Crypto.name: invalidASN1IntegerEncoding
Enums/CryptoKitASN1Error.html#/s:6Crypto.abstract: An ASN.1 integer was decoded that does not use the minimum number of bytes for its encoding.

Enums/CryptoKitASN1Error.html#/s:6Crypto.name: truncatedASN1Field
Enums/CryptoKitASN1Error.html#/s:6Crypto.abstract: An ASN.1 field was truncated and could not be decoded.

Enums/CryptoKitASN1Error.html#/s:6Crypto.name: unsupportedFieldLength
Enums/CryptoKitASN1Error.html#/s:6Crypto.abstract: The encoding used for the field length is not supported.

Enums/CryptoKitASN1Error.html#/s:6Crypto.name: invalidPEMDocument
Enums/CryptoKitASN1Error.html#/s:6Crypto.abstract: It was not possible to parse a string as a PEM document.

Enums/ChaChaPoly/Nonce.html#/s:6Crypto03.name: init()
Enums/ChaChaPoly/Nonce.html#/s:6Crypto03.abstract: Generates a fresh random Nonce. Unless required by a specification to provide a specific Nonce, this is the recommended initializer.

Enums/AES/KeyWrap.html#/s:6Crypto3AESO7K.name: wrap(_:using:)
Enums/AES/KeyWrap.html#/s:6Crypto3AESO7K.abstract: Wraps a key with AES wrap (RFC 3394), according to the IETF RFC 3394 specification.

Enums/AES/KeyWrap.html#/s:6Crypto3AESO7K.name: unwrap(_:using:)
Enums/AES/KeyWrap.html#/s:6Crypto3AESO7K.abstract: Unwraps a key with AES wrap, according to the IETF RFC 3394 specification.

Enums/AES/GCM/Nonce.html#/s:6Crypto3AESO.name: init()
Enums/AES/GCM/Nonce.html#/s:6Crypto3AESO.abstract: Generates a fresh random Nonce. Unless required by a specification to provide a specific Nonce, this is the recommended initializer.

Enums/AES/KeyWrap.html.name: KeyWrap
Enums/AES/KeyWrap.html.abstract: The Key Wrapping module provides AES Key Wrapping, according to the IETF RFC 3394 specification.

Enums/ChaChaPoly.html.name: ChaChaPoly
Enums/ChaChaPoly.html.abstract: ChaCha20-Poly1305 as described in RFC 7539 with 96-bit nonces.

Enums/CryptoKitASN1Error.html.name: CryptoKitASN1Error
Enums/CryptoKitASN1Error.html.abstract: Errors encountered when parsing ASN.1 formatted keys.

Enums/Insecure.html.name: Insecure
Enums/Insecure.html.abstract: Algorithms that we support for legacy reasons but that are insecure to use.
